attributes.action: Publicly Condemn the Treatment of LGBT Individuals in Chechnya
attributes.additional_details:
So far, only Baroness Anelay has publicly called out Chechnya's actions. If we wish to keep our place on the international stage as a force to be reckoned with post-Brexit, the UK must stand up for blatant soiling of human rights such as these. 


Sources:

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/minister-condemns-persecution-of-lgbt-community-in-chechnya

http://bit.ly/LGBTchechnyaWake
attributes.background: This week, Pink News broke the story that the ill-treatment of LGBT and suspected LGBT individuals in the Russian state of Chechnya now includes interment in concentration camps - where torture, punishment and possibly death await those who enter. Our government must speak out against this injustice
